songs.title: Magic
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Harry & All]
Baby, c'mon over, I don't care if people find out
Dada dadada da da da da
They say that we're no good together and it's never gonna work out
Dada dadada da da da da

[Pre-Chorus: Liam]
But baby you got me moving too fast 'cause I know you wanna be bad
And girl when you're looking like that, I can't hold back

[Chorus: All]
'Cause you, you've got this spell on me, I don't know what to believe
Kiss you once now I can't leave
'Cause everything you do is magic
But everything you do is magic

[Verse 2: Zayn & All]
So let them take the pictures, spread it all around the world now
Dada dadada da da da da
I wanna put it on my record, I want everyone to know now
Dada dadada da da da da

[Pre-Chorus: Liam]
But baby you got me moving too fast 'cause I know you want to be bad
And girl when you're looking like that, I can't hold back

[Chorus: All]
'Cause you, you've got this spell on me, I don't know what to believe
Kiss you once now I can't leave
'Cause everything you do is magic
But everything you do is magic
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh
Everything you do is magic

[Bridge: Niall & Louis]
They say that we're no good together and it's never gonna work out
I wanna put it on my record, I want everyone to know now
Everything you do is magic, everything you do is magic
Everything you do is magic, everything you do is magic

[Chorus: All]
'Cause you, you've got this spell on me, I don't know what to believe
Kiss you once now I can't leave
'Cause everything you do is magic
But everything you do is magic
Oh oh oh oh oh, oh oh oh oh oh
C'mon, kiss you once now I can't leave
'Cause everything you do is magic
But everything you do is magic
